attributes.action: Ensure that the Red Arrows continue to fly as a fitting tribute to Flt Lt Jon Egging
attributes.additional_details:
Ensure that following any findings of the accident inquiry in to the crash of Red Arrows pilot Flt Lt Jon Eggings that all steps are taken and resources are a made available to keep the Red Arrows display team flying as a showpiece for the RAF and the UK at shows around the world.
This will honour the memory of Flt Lt Eggings who was tragically killed in a crash on August 20th 2011.
